title: Attack on Titan
description: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, Eren Yeager joins the Scout Regiment to get revenge on the Titans.

title: Demon Slayer
description: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister Nezuko, who has been turned into a demon.

title: One Piece
description: Monkey D. Luffy sets out to become the Pirate King by finding the legendary One Piece treasure with his Straw Hat crew.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers use alchemy to try to bring their mother back to life, but the cost is great. Now they seek the Philosopher's Stone to fix what was lost.

title: Your Name
description: Two teenagers mysteriously swap bodies and form a deep connection across time and space as they try to meet in real life.
